title: Rebekah Vardy claims Coleen Rooney blocked her Instagram months before scandal
text:
Rebekah and Coleen have been embroiled in a fierce public row (Picture: Backgrid; Rex)

Rebekah Vardy has claimed that Coleen Rooney blocked her on Instagram months before the ‘WAGatha Christie’ scandal kicked off.

After Coleen made bombshell claims, accusing Rebekah of selling stories on her after carrying out an intricate plan, Rebekah has spoken out with her side of the story.

The star reflected on the past seven months of her friendship with Wayne Rooney’s wife, telling the Daily Mail: ‘I sent her a message and asked her: “Have I done something, is there a problem here? I seem to be blocked on Instagram.”‘

She added: ‘And she said no, it was probably one of the kids messing about with her phone that had done it. She was completely convincing.’

Coleen has been dubbed ‘WAGatha Christie’ (Picture: Getty Images)

However, sources claimed to The Mirror that Coleen ‘knew’ Rebekah was to blame for the stories making their way to The Sun.

Advertisement

They added that she needed ‘proof’ and that simply blocking her wasn’t going to ‘cut the mustard’.

Coleen sent the internet into meltdown earlier this week when she revealed she’d been trying to suss out who had been selling stories on her.

While she accused her former friend Rebekah, the 37-year-old denied all claims.

‘As I have just said to you on the phone, I wish you had called me if you thought this. I never speak to anyone about you as various journalists who have asked me over the years can vouch for,’ she fired back in her own statement.

‘If you thought this was happening you could have told me & I could have changed my passwords to see if it stopped. Over the years various people have had access to my Insta and just this week I found I was following people I didn’t know and have never followed myself.’

Fellow WAG Danielle Lloyd later waded into the row, claiming she has previously ‘had run-ins with Rebekah before over similar things’.

Asked whether she believes Rebekah is responsible, Danielle replied on This Morning: ‘It’s definitely come from Becky’s account so who was it?

‘I think she did it. Sadly I really do. I think it’s a shame because she probably never thought she was going to get caught out.’

After making the claims live on air, Rebekah has since denied Danielle’s accusations they had ‘similar run-ins’ with a particularly scathing tweet.

Advertisement

‘Danielle Lloyd making false claims on @thismorning that we have had “similar run-ins” is utter boll**ks,’ Rebekah wrote.

Since, Becky has confirmed there is an ‘investigation’ into Coleen’s claims, with it being reported that she’s been ‘forced’ to take her kids out of school.

Metro.co.uk has contacted Coleen’s reps for comment.
